channel.title: OpenCV on MILAI AI

item.title: OpenCV Usage
item.description: CMake Usage cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8) project( DisplayImage ) find_package( OpenCV REQUIRED ) include_directories( ${OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIRS} ) add_executable( DisplayImage DisplayImage.cpp ) target_link_libraries( DisplayImage ${OpenCV_LIBS} ) Basic variables: OpenCV_LIBS : The list of all imported targets for OpenCV modules. OpenCV_INCLUDE_DIRS : The OpenCV include directories. OpenCV_COMPUTE_CAPABILITIES : The version of compute capability. OpenCV_ANDROID_NATIVE_API_LEVEL : Minimum required level of Android API. OpenCV_VERSION : The version of this OpenCV build: “3.3.1” OpenCV_VERSION_MAJOR : Major version part
